Manager) Application Deadline : 09 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Dhaka (GULSHAN 1) Salary: Negotiable Experience: 3 to 5 years Published: 07 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Bachelor of Arts (BA) in Fine Arts Experience 3 to 5 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Group of Companies Additional Requirements Minimum 3 years of professional design experience in a creative agency or fast-paced corporate environment. The "Design-First" Mindset: A degree in Fine Arts or Graphic Design is a plus, but your portfolio is your true resume. We want to see a deep understanding of layout, typography, and color theory. AI Proficiency: You must be comfortable integrating AI into your workflow to speed up production and explore new creative styles. Print Specialist: Expert knowledge of bleed, margins, CMYK vs. RGB, and paper stock specifications for high-quality communication materials. Software Stack: Expert: Adobe Creative Suite (specifically Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign). Intermediate: Figma/Canva for digital collaboration. AI Tools: Midjourney, Magnific, or similar. The Ideal Candidate: You follow design accounts on Behance/Dribbble and know what's "in" right now. You don't just "generate" images; you direct them. You are detail-oriented enough to catch a 1pt alignment error in a 50-page print document. Responsibilities & Context We are searching for a Senior Visualizer (Sr. Executive/Asst. Manager) with a "future-forward" mindset. You’ll be our lead visual storyteller, blending classic design principles with the efficiency of AI. Whether it’s a high-end coffee table brochure or a viral digital campaign, you know how to make it look premium, trendy, and cohesive. What You’ll Be Doing: AI-Enhanced Ideation: Use Generative AI (Midjourney, Adobe Firefly, DALL-E) to storyboard, conceptualize, and produce high-fidelity visuals at scale. Print & Production: Design high-impact communication materials, including corporate brochures, annual reports, event branding, and large-format print media. Brand Evolution: Maintain and evolve our visual identity across all touchpoints, ensuring we remain at the forefront of design trends. Hybrid Workflows: Take raw AI outputs and refine them using Photoshop and Illustrator into professional, brand-compliant assets. End-to-End Execution: Manage projects from the initial "mood board" phase through to the final print-ready files (pre-press). Skills & Expertise Suggested by Storyboarding Figma Canva Adobe Creative Suite Typography Compensation & Other Benefits

Responsibilities & Context Blue Creations Limited is a 100% Export-oriented woven top-bottom garments Washing plant, located at Kashimpur, Gazipur. The company is seeking to appoint a talent aspirant to the Head in Research & Development Department . The ideal candidate will drive innovation in dry and wet processing, including the development of high-end washes, improved sample turnaround time, and sustainable laundry technologies (Laser, Ozone, E-flow) to meet the requirements of premium global brands. Develop cost-effective wash recipes without compromising the aesthetic of the garment. Oversee R&D activities for new washing techniques aligned with fashion trends and sustainability. Spearhead the use of eco-friendly technologies like Laser (Jeanologia/VAV), Ozone (G2), and Nano-bubble (E-flow). Present new developments directly to international buyers and designers during development meetings. Collaborate with production, merchandising, and quality teams to ensure buyer satisfaction and technical compliance. Ensure all wash recipes and chemical usage follow environmental and safety regulations. Conduct trial runs, analyze results, and optimize wash effects and garment quality. Maintain detailed documentation of processes, test reports, and innovation records. Work closely with chemical suppliers and external labs for innovation and compliance testing. Monitor daily production-related technical issues and provide immediate solutions. Skills & Expertise Buy

He identified some acute problems faced by the tribal people during conducting a formal research for his Ph.D degree. To address those problems, Ashrai was founded in 1990. As a global leader, CARE is shaping the future of the humanitarian and development sector. Each year, we deliver support and services to millions of people in over a hundred countries. We do this by focusing on our mission and living the values that drive our organization. A career at CARE is an opportunity to be part of a movement that brings communities together to solve complex problems and foster lasting change throughout the world. We seek individuals who are passionate about humanitarian and development work, collaborate well with others, embrace learning and innovation, and deliver results. What it’s like to work at CARE? CARE is a mission-driven international humanitarian aid and development organization that offers an opportunity to work with people across the world. Not a day will go by that you won’t learn something profound, meet an expert, or write a sentence that can change a life. We are committed to an environment where everyone can succeed. Scope of the Role: CARE Bangladesh as an implementing partner of WFP will implement a project titled ‘Green Skills Development in Rohingya Camps’. The project aims to scale up homestead-based gardening in 10500 HHs of several Rohingya Camps in Ukhiya, Cox’s Bazar as nutrition-sensitive programs to promote the consumption of nutrient-dense foods, such as vegetable growing, through sack/vertical gardening methods in community setups, including pond aquaculture, poultry and pigeon rearing, mushroom cultivation, seedling/sapling production, kitchen composting, ginger and turmeric cultivation etc. The project will also work on agricultural innovations in the camps. The Technical Facilitator will be responsible for activity monitoring, training facilitation, monitoring, maintaining liaison with the camp administration, sectors, and coordination with the CiC office. One of the main responsibilities will be the cash and input distribution of the WFP-funded Green Skills project. He/she is also responsible for the recorded document and others related to the CBT (cash-based transfer) in coordination with the Technical Manager, Technical Officer, and Finance Officers. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 25 to 32 years খাদ্য শিল্প বা অনুরূপ প্রতিষ্ঠানে সমজাতীয় কাজে ন্যূনতম ২ বছরের অভিজ্ঞতা থাকতে হবে। লেদ ও মিলিং মেশিন অপারেশনে অভিজ্ঞ প্রার্থীদের অগ্রাধিকার দেয়া হবে। Responsibilities & Context স্কয়ার ফুড অ্যান্ড বেভারেজ লিমিটেড বাংলাদেশের একটি শীর্ষস্থানীয়, স্বনামধন্য ও ISO 9001:2015 সনদপ্রাপ্ত প্রতিষ্ঠান. প্রতিষ্ঠার পর থেকে গত বিশ বছরেরও বেশি সময় ধরে, স্কয়ার ফুড অ্যান্ড বেভারেজ লিমিটেড - বাংলাদেশের খাদ্য ও পানীয় খাতে অগ্রণী ভূমিকা পালন করে আসছে। আমাদের চলমান প্রবৃদ্ধিকে আরও এগিয়ে নিতে, আমাদের ইঞ্জিনিয়ারিং বিভাগে নিম্নোক্ত পদে আমরা একজন দক্ষ ও কর্মঠ প্রার্থী খুঁজছি। Key Responsibilities: ফিটার হিসেবে কাজ করা; যেমন—পাম্প, মোটর, গিয়ারবক্স, চেইন অ্যালাইনমেন্ট, বেয়ারিং সেটিং, লেদ মেশিন অপারেশন, ওয়েল্ডিং, নতুন মেশিন স্থাপন (ইরেকশন), এবং পাইপলাইন কাজ (SS ও MS উভয়ই)। ফ্যাক্টরির সকল মেশিনারির সুষ্ঠ ও নিরবচ্ছিন্ন চলাচল নিশ্চিত করা। হঠাৎ মেশিন বিকল হলে তাৎক্ষণিক ব্যবস্থা গ্রহণ করা, যাতে উৎপাদন স্বাভাবিক থাকে। ফ্যাক্টরির সকল মেশিনারির মেরামত ও নিয়মিত রক্ষণাবেক্ষণ সময়সূচি নিশ্চিত করা। নির্ধারিত সময়সূচি অনুযায়ী মেশিনারির সার্বিকভাবে কার্যক্রম যথাসময়ে সম্পন্ন করা। উৎপাদন যেন বাধাগ্রস্ত না হয় সে জন্য ব্যবহারিক রক্ষণাবেক্ষণ কাজে সর্বোচ্চ প্রচেষ্টা প্রয়োগ করা। ফ্যাক্টরির জরুরি পরিস্থিতিতে প্রয়োজন অনুযায়ী অন্যান্য কাজ সম্পাদন করা। সুপারভাইজার কর্তৃক অর্পিত অন্যান্য সকল দায়িত্ব পালন করা। ISO 9001:2015 এবং ISO 22716:2007 মানদণ্ডের প্রযোজ্য সকল শর্ত বজায় রাখা। Skills & Expertise Suggested by Mechanic Mechanical mechanical maintenance Mechanical Technician Mechanics Compensation & Other Benefits প্রার্থীর যোগ্যতা ও কোম্পানির নীতিমালা অনুযায়ী নির্ধারিত হবে। কোম্পানির পলিসি / নীতিমালা অনুযায়ী আকর্ষণীয় বেতন ও সুবিধাদি প্রদান করা হবে। Employment Status Full Time Job Location Pabna Company Information Square Food & Beverage Ltd. Should have leadership and interpersonal skills to deal with the vendors. Good communication skills in spoken and written English and Bengali. Should have good knowledge of computer applications, including MS Word, Excel, Internet, etc. Should be able to work on own initiative and under pressure with a set target. Responsibilities & Context The incumbent is responsible for the overall quality assurance activities of the QA Department. Is responsible for planning and assigning tasks of QA Inspectors & QA Supervisors and evaluating their performance. Resolve quality-related issues in Production Identify causes and action steps to improve the product and reduce reject/returns To attend final inspection by buyers/ 3rd party and be responsible for product quality as per the approved sample Ensuring product quality as per the company’s set quality standard. Update the higher authority about the production status, quality and on-time delivery. Is responsible for maintaining quality standards of products throughout production procedures (In-line to Final Inspection) and shipment of garments. Skills & Expertise Knit garments Lingerie Production Quality Suggested by Quality assurance and control Quality Control Textile Testing Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. Job Location Mymensingh (Bhaluka) Read Before Apply The applicants should have extensive experience only in the reputable lingerie industry. Responsibilities & Context Sterling Styles Limited is a 100% Export-oriented woven top-bottom garments manufacturing company, located at Ashulia. The company is seeking to appoint a talent aspirant to the Assistant Manager/Manager role in the VAT & Tax section of Accounts & Finance. The candidate has to lead the tax and VAT function by ensuring 100% compliance with Bangladesh's fiscal laws, optimizing tax liabilities through strategic planning, and representing the company before NBR authorities. PLEASE DO NOT APPLY if you do not have VAT & TAX Experience in the RMG Industry. Oversee the maintenance of all VAT registers, including Mushak 6.1, 6.2, 6.3, 6.6, 6.8, and 9.1 (VAT Return). Ensure accurate Tax Deduction at Source (TDS) as per the Income Tax Act 2023 (specifically covering Sections 86, 89, 90, 102, 108, etc.). Prepare and monitor Advance Tax (Section 154) payments and manage Tax Provisioning schedules monthly. Oversee the preparation and filing of Monthly/Annual Withholding Tax Returns and the Annual Corporate Tax Return. Prepare detailed Landed Cost Sheets by calculating Customs Duty (CD), Regulatory Duty (RD), Supplementary Duty (SD), and Advance Tax (AT) for imported raw materials. Coordinate with the Commercial team to ensure that VAT and Duty exemptions are correctly reflected in the books. Act as the primary point of contact for External Auditors and NBR Officials during annual Tax/VAT audits, hearing & appeal matters, investigations, and show-cause notices. Monitor changes in Finance Acts, SROs (Statutory Regulatory Orders), and General Orders to advise management on potential impacts. Skills & Expertise Accounting Software Accounts and audit Customs Bond Rules and Regulations Good English communication skills (verbal and Written) Income Tax and VAT Income Tax

Lead generation and prospecting: Actively source and pursue new projects, clients, and investors through networking, industry events, and market research. Client and partner relationships: Build and maintain strong, long-term relationships with potential clients, investors, contractors, architects, and other industry stakeholders. Sales and negotiation: Prepare and deliver persuasive presentations and proposals, negotiate contracts, and close deals to secure profitable projects. Market analysis: Conduct market research to identify trends, analyze industry data, and assess project viability. Cross-functional collaboration: Work closely with internal teams, such as project management, development, and finance, to align business development goals with operational capabilities and ensure successful project execution. Performance tracking and reporting: Track sales metrics, monitor project pipelines, and report on performance, revenue forecasts, and market trends to management. Compliance and Operations: Ensure all properties and projects comply with local, state, and federal regulations and codes. Oversee maintenance, repairs, and operational activities to maintain asset quality and ensure a safe environment. Leadership: Ability to lead teams, make decisions, and manage multiple projects simultaneously. Stakeholder and Relationship Management: Build and maintain relationships with key external parties, including landowners, brokers, tenants, government agencies, and contractors. Represent the company professionally and negotiate contracts and agreements. Responsibilities & Context We are looking for a proactive and detail-oriented Executive – Operations to support and oversee day-to-day operational activities across our group of companies. The role involves coordinating with multiple departments, improving operational efficiency, ensuring compliance with company policies, and supporting senior management in achieving business objectives. Key Responsibilities: Operational Oversight: Assist the Operations Manager in day-to-day activities to ensure smooth business execution. Billing & Verification: Thoroughly verify all bills, invoices, and payment claims to ensure accuracy and prevent overbilling. Quality Assurance (QA): Conduct rigorous quality checks on completed work and services to ensure they meet company standards. Procurement Inspection: Inspect all purchased materials and goods for quality, quantity, and compliance with specifications before acceptance. Financial Monitoring: Monitor Profit & Loss (P&L) statements and track operational expenses to maximize cost-efficiency. Audit & Compliance: Proactively identify irregularities, unauthorized expenses, or any form of operational misconduct. Documentation & Legal: Draft, review, and manage Vendor Agreements , Work Orders , and Service Level Agreements (SLAs). Vendor Management: Communicate with vendors and suppliers to ensure timely delivery and adherence to contract terms. Strong negotiation skills. Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines. Firm personality to handle vendors and enforce company policies. Learning and Development Manager : ShopUp Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List ShopUp Learning and Development Manager Application Deadline : 09 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Location: Dhaka Published: 25 Jan 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Additional Requirements Professional Experience: Minimum 6 years of experience in Learning and Development, with at least 2 years in a strategic role. Proven experience designing and delivering learning solutions, including LMS setup and management. Strong understanding of adult learning principles and instructional design. Experience working in distribution, logistics, or similar high-volume operational environments preferred. Excellent stakeholder management and communication skills. Educational Qualification: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Organizational Development, Education, or related field. Professional certifications in L&D, instructional design, or coaching will be considered an advantage. *Female candidates are preferable. Responsibilities & Context The Learning and Development Manager will be responsible for designing and driving a comprehensive learning strategy aligned with business objectives, specifically supporting the Distribution and Logistics verticals. This role will lead the creation of an in-house Learning Management System (LMS), develop impactful training programs, and ensure continuous skill development across the organization. The ideal candidate is strategic, execution-focused, and passionate about people development. Major Responsibilities: LMS Development & Management: Lead the end-to-end development and implementation of an in-house LMS platform to deliver training content effectively. Continuously optimize for user experience and learning outcomes. Content Development: Plan, design, and execute training content tailored for LMS deployment, ensuring alignment with business needs and learner engagement. Strategy & Design: Develop and implement a company-wide L&D strategy focused on Distribution and Logistics teams, ensuring integration with broader organizational goals. Program Management: Create and deliver diverse learning programs (workshops, e-learning, blended formats) while ensuring strategic time utilization and learning effectiveness. Training Needs Analysis: Identify current and future skill gaps across departments through systematic needs assessments and stakeholder consultations. Impact Measurement: Track training outcomes and return on investment (ROI), providing regular reports to leadership with insights and recommendations. Coaching & Mentoring: Establish and support internal coaching and leadership development initiatives to foster a culture of continuous learning and growth. Skills & Expertise Suggested by Stakeholder Management Training
